summary: Central module that consolidates and re‑exports Django’s Object‑Relational Mapping (ORM) core classes, field types, query utilities, managers, expressions, aggregations, lookups, relationship helpers, deletion policies and signals, providing a single import point for model definitions and related operations.
business_intent: Enable developers to define database models and perform ORM operations by importing a unified namespace, simplifying access to model base classes, field definitions, query constructs, and auxiliary helper functions.
